verses.roman:
prabhu-ājñāya dharilā nāma--'paramānanda-dāsa'
'purī-dāsa' kari' prabhu karena upahāsa

synonyms: prabhu-ājñāya—under the order of Śrī-Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dharilā nāma—held the name; paramānanda-dāsa—Paramānanda dāsa; purī-dāsa—Purī dāsa; kari'-as; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; karena upahāsa—began to joke.
translation: The child was named Paramānanda dāsa in accordance with the Lord's order, and the Lord jokingly called him Purī dāsa.
